name: Goblins Gone VRong
description:
"There once was a pub, a humble inn, Where goblin's leisure has always been Ensured to last from dusk till dawn, To dance and drink with wicked spawn, To feast on hot dog and mighty potion, Enjoy the sickness of mind and motion." Fnug, the Garbler

Experimental VR prototype. Will induce nausea, might cause seizures. 

Use at own risk.

Move via screaming into mic + right thumb stick / trackpad, interaction via grabbing. 

Won't work without mic input (best experience with HMD microphone)!!

Code and Design: Victor Morales, Ben Wahl

Design: Georg Hobmeier

Store Graphics: Julia Nguyen, Daniel Rachbauer

Powered by gold extra & Causa Creations
